techmeme.title: Israel-based Seraphic Security, whose product allows customers to securely access SaaS and private web applications, raised a $29M Series A led by GreatPoint (Ryan Naraine/SecurityWeek)
Tether had $13B in 2024 net profits, including ~$7B from its US Treasuries and repo holdings, and $5B from unrealized appreciation of gold and bitcoin holdings (Krisztian Sandor/CoinDesk)
Source: Anton Levy is stepping down as General Atlantic's co-president and chairman of global technology; Levy led investments in Alibaba, Facebook, and more (Dan Primack/Axios)
Sources: OpenAI plans to release o3-mini today with o1-level reasoning and 4o-level speed, as the company's staff is galvanized by DeepSeek's success (Zoë Schiffer/Wired)
LinkedIn says short-form video is its fastest-growing content category, and total video viewership grew 36% YoY between October 30, 2024 and January 29, 2025 (Alexander Lee/Digiday)
